the top of the stars

One of the most important footballers of our time is Lionel Messi, with a complex history of suffering growth problems as a young man. He has become one of the biggest icons internationally, his net worth is 41 million dollars per year.

At 34 years old, Messi made a big decision in 2021 to leave Barcelona and choose PSG, nothing more and nothing less. This was moving news worldwide, since Messi is one of the players who has made the most history playing with Barcelona. However, this new course of history has taken him to the major leagues and to a place where he is more appreciated.

Nyemar Jr, Messi’s partner, also signed a contract with PSG last year, positioning him again in the top 10 players in the world. His payment will be 36.5 million dollars per year, being the second with the highest income after Messi.

Another of the most recognized stars is Cristiano Ronaldo, his net worth is 36 million dollars and historically he has a unique position in the English Premier League. These three players will not have to worry about their financial income anymore, mainly because this is a reflection of what they have achieved individually and reasons why they are so loved.

Following them, who mark the first three positions of the top 10 soccer players in 2022 are also:

  • Robert Lewandowski: With a total of 183 goals, he is among the top 5 highest paid footballers. And this is due to the high capacity that he has as a player, being one of the most important players in Bayern Munich,
  • Mohamed Salah: Forward of Liverpool, his net worth is 88 million dollars.
  • Kylian Mbappe: At just 23 years old, he is considered one of the youngest and most talented athletes in the sport.
  • Erling Haaland: with 61 goals, in his 65 career games. This young Englishman has earned his place on this list.
  • Jan Oblak: worth 56 million dollars, the Slovenian player is one of the representatives of the Spanish first division.
  • Harry Kane: His annual income from gaming and advertising appearances is $12 million, making his net worth $49 million.
  • N’Golo Kanté: An important player for Chelsea and France, his current net income is $20 million.
